info.name: New Twitter Prettyfied
info.description: Prettyfies the dreaded New Twitter Interface Places a topbar on top of the page like the old layout. Smaller text in the sidebar. Breaks between tweets to make timeline more eligible. Adjusted 'Messages' box Notifications UI improved If you like the Legacy Layout: https://userstyles.org/styles/167861/coffee-twitter-style
info.additionalInfo:
*30/04/2019 Updated for the New Twitter Interface
*28/04/2019 Fixed New Twitter main column alignment.
